qas.question: Who said Kerry is an 'avid cyclist'?
What type of bicycle does Kerry prefer?
What bicycles did Kerry use while campaigning?

answers.text: recumbent stationary bikes for his hotel rooms

qas.question: What other sports does Kerry participate in?

context: In addition to the sports he played at Yale, Kerry is described by <a0_0>Sports Illustrated<a0_0/>, among others, as an "avid cyclist", primarily riding on <a1_0>a road bike<a1_0/>. Prior to his presidential bid, Kerry was known to have participated in several <a2_0>long-distance rides<a2_0/> (centuries). Even during his many campaigns, he was reported to have visited bicycle stores in both his home state and elsewhere. His staff requested <a3_0>recumbent stationary bikes for his hotel rooms<a3_0/>. He has also been a <a4_0>snowboarder, windsurfer, and sailor<a4_0/>.
